abstract: Even as Apple mocks the problems of Windows Vista, its own OS X Leopard is causing system crashes and other problems.
snippet: Even as Apple mocks the problems of Windows Vista, its own OS X Leopard is causing system crashes and other problems.
lead_paragraph: After I wrote about Apple’s latest attack ad featuring a flashing banner that reads “Give up on Vista,” I heard from several people (only one of whom works for Microsoft) pointing out that Apple’s own new operating system, OS X Leopard, is having its own problems.

headline.main: Don’t Give Up on Leopard (Despite the Bugs)

abstract: The SanDisk Sansa View claims 35 hours of audio and 7 hours of video playback on a single charge.
snippet: The SanDisk Sansa View claims 35 hours of audio and 7 hours of video playback on a single charge.
lead_paragraph: SanDisk, like other makers of portable multimedia players, seems to always be one step behind Apple. But that may be changing.

headline.main: A Portable Multimedia Player Takes on the Apple Nano
headline.print_headline: A Portable Multimedia Player Takes On the Apple Nano

abstract: The chief executive of Qualcomm gave the iPhone credit for making consumers more eager for third-generation cellphone networks.
snippet: The chief executive of Qualcomm gave the iPhone credit for making consumers more eager for third-generation cellphone networks.
lead_paragraph: PARIS, Nov. 28  Paul E. Jacobs, chief executive of Qualcomm, the maker of chips for mobile phones, insisted it was pure coincidence that he found himself within a few blocks of where the iPhone was introduced to France on Wednesday.
